title: [Large-Scale] Strategies to Enhance Practitioner Engagement in Blended Online Learning Environments

context.prior_knowledge: Knowledge of fundamental science theories and practical field experience
context.additional_context: Smartphone-based LMS utilization possible, motivation needed for assessment activities

learning_goals: Learners participate in discussion activities using an LMS in a blended environment at a rate of over 80%.
Learners reflect on their learning outcomes three or more times through peer and self-assessment.
Learners achieve over 75% in formative assessments accessible via mobile devices.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
